name: mandrake
description: Template para projetos em React Native, com estrutura de pastas customizada, estilos globais, ESLint + Prettier + Babel Plugin Root Import, React Navigation, Axios e Redux configurados.

scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw

author: Pedro Lopes <pedrolopes.info@gmail.com.br>
